name: mihsef_snapshot
description: Snapshot guild roles/channels/overwrites to JSON and provide stepwise admin helpers.
author: MiHSEF
install_msg: MiHSEF Snapshot loaded. Use `[p]mihsef snapshot now` to write a JSON backup.
end_user_data_statement: This cog writes server structure metadata (IDs, names, permissions) to /data/mihsef_snapshots for backup/restore by server admins.
